Old Dominion Freight Line's First Quarter 2015 Conference Call On The Internet
Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. April 2, 2015 12:29 PM
?
Content preferences
Done
THOMASVILLE, N.C., April 2, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. (NASDAQ: ODFL) announced today that it plans to release its first quarter 2015 financial results before opening of trading on Thursday, April 30, 2015.  The Company will also hold a conference call to discuss its financial results and outlook at 10:00 a.m. (Eastern Time) on Thursday, April 30, 2015.
An online, real-time webcast of Old Dominion's quarterly conference call will be available at www.odfl.com on Thursday, April 30, 2015, at 10:00 a.m. (Eastern Time). The online replay will be available at approximately 1:00 p.m. (Eastern Time) and continue for 30 days.  A telephonic replay of the call will also be available through May 15, 2015, at 719-457-0820, confirmation number 8002657.
Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. is a leading, less-than-truckload ("LTL"), union-free motor carrier providing regional, inter-regional and national LTL service and other logistics services from a single integrated organization. In addition to its core LTL services, the Company offers its customers a broad range of value-added services including international freight forwarding, ground and air expedited transportation, container delivery, truckload brokerage, supply chain consulting, warehousing and consumer household pickup and delivery.
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/old-dominion-freight-lines-first-quarter-2015-conference-call-on-the-internet-300060381.html
